roleset.name: to increase, supplement
roleset.note: AUGMENT-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls other_cos-45.4. (from augment.01-v)
AUGMENTATION-N NOTES: Based on augment-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls other_cos-45.4. (from augmentation.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` We will support it , we will thank him , and we will augment it where appropriate , '' said [*T*-1] Rep. Vic Fazio ( D. , Calif . ) .

example.name: transitive with ARG2
example.text: We will augment your salary by $10,000 per annum

example.name: another arg2
example.text: To give this patient the best result Dr. Pousti augmented her breasts with silicone implants and performed an extended tummy tuck on her.
example.arg: To give this patient the best result

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: He still wants posterity to revere and remember him, as is indicated by his augmentation of Walton's written account of his tale.
example.arg: of Walton's written account of his tale

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: the augmentation of your salary by $10,000 per annum

example.name: another arg2
example.text: This woman desired an augmentation of her breasts with saline breast implants.
